name: The Hidden Crystals
description: The Hidden Crystals is a solo developed project that aims to capture the essence of treasure hunting. Follow a short exploration experience, where the main mechanic consists on observing the world around you to guide your way through this mysterious island which contain a simple, but powerful story, told throught environment and lost items. Make your way to a desert, forests, swamp and a snow field while losing yourself in this minimalist approach to environment design and simple art style.
